## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                             | Type                                         | Default    |
| ----------- | ------------ | --------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `fullWidth` | `full-width` | Define if table fits its parent element | `boolean`                                    | `false`    |
| `size`      | `size`       | Define table size                       | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small" \| "xlarge"` | `'medium'` |
